steps.description: Villagers whisper of a cursed shrine where a guardian spirit now turns away pilgrims.
Discover the shrine abandoned, with strange symbols etched into nearby trees.
A hidden message reveals the guardian betrayed by their own, marking the beginning of a curse.
Confront the village elder, who admits to a forgotten betrayal for personal gain.
Perform a ritual to cleanse the shrine and restore the guardian's trust.
Hear tales of a haunted bridge, where travelers are entranced by melodies at dusk.
Find odd markings and a disturbing aura surrounding the bridge.
Uncover that an ancient ritual was performed here, trapping a spirit beneath the stones.
An encounter with the spirit temporarily possesses a party member, revealing forgotten truths.
Break the lingering effects of the failed ritual by restoring the ceremonial music with the spirit's guidance.
Villagers report sightings of a ghostly figure near ancient ruins, heralding ill fate.
Explore the ruin and encounter a spectral revenant echoing a mournful warning.
Unveil the site as a forgotten battleground where betrayal led to unjust deaths.
Discover the remains of the fallen and learn of their forgotten legacy.
Lay the revenant's spirit to rest by honoring their lost story and cleansing the site.
